title: Ukrainian President Poroshenko Asks US For Cash, Support
teaser: Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko is visiting the United States to ask for support to takcle what he describes as Russian aggression.
contentencoded:
Ukrainian President, Petro Poroshenko, is on a key visit to the U.S. seekingÂ further support to tackle what he describes as Russian aggression.

Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson checks in with Olga Bielkova, a member of the Ukrainian Parliament with the Ukrainian Democratic Alliance for Freedom Party.

Guest

  • Olga Bielkova, member of the Ukrainian Parliament with the Ukrainian Democratic Alliance for Freedom Party.
